about_the_game:
In the near future, the sinister Servos Corporation has been working hard to establish a monopoly over the mega metropolis of Nuevo Domingo.
Once a city filled with music and laughter, crime and chaos now fester in the Outskirts. Those loyal to the corp live in the luxurious Inner Ring. And all the while, the nefarious leader of the corporation, Donovan, oversees the city from the imposing HQ building.

In this third-person beat-'em-up, play as Ariadna as you skate, swing, and bash your way through the ranks of the evil Servos Corporation throughout colorful and vibrant levels.

Key Features


  • Three Massive Levels
First, fight through Ari's colorful hometown, the Outskirts. Then, skate your way through the Inner Ring, the wealthy city center. Fiinally, help Ariadna take her revenge as she storms through the Servos HQ.

  • Side Hustles
There's no shortage of unique side objectives to take on in each area of Nuevo Domingo!

  • Character Customization
From Ari's hair to the graffiti she sprays, there's no shortage of ways to express yourself in Rolling Revolt!

  • Full Spanish Language Support
All cutscenes, voiceline, and text in the game can be enjoyed in both English and Spanish, a first for any UCF student game!

name: Rolling Revolt

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In the futuristic city of Nuevo Domingo, experience the tale of Ariadna's revenge as you skate, swing, and bash your way through the ranks of the evil Servos Corporation.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
